name: wingman
title: Wingman
description: An assortment of useful utility and menu bar commands.
author: Boboon

scripts.build: ray build --output dist && npm run sync

commands.name: datetime
commands.title: Date & Time
commands.description: Process dates and times using natural language.

commands.name: orbstack
commands.title: OrbStack Data Location
commands.description: Show the current OrbStack data location in the menu bar.

commands.name: network
commands.title: Network Location
commands.description: Show the current network location in the menu bar.
